circumstances: The crew departed Cody in the afternoon in a firefighting mission in the region of Dubois. While completing a pullup from a swath run, the crew lost control of the airplane that crashed on the slope of a mountain. Both pilots were killed.
probable_cause:
The pilot misjudged the altitude and clearance and failed to obtain/maintain flying speed. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Downdrafts, updrafts, 
- High density altitude (13,000 feet),
- Fire drop down slope side of mountain, 
- Downwind run, 
- Wind up to 35 mph.
